channel.title: Everything I've Learned About Caffeine. Look at this bird. - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: No really. Look at this bird: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HUngLgGRJpo&t Any substance that gives you a lift follows the same journey as the bird in the video. DISCLAIMER: YOU MAY NOT FEEL ANY NEGATIVES OF CAFFEINE UNTIL YEARS OF USE!! Or.. you may not associate the negatives that are currently happening with caffeine. This is because there is a disconnect with the immediate response to caffeine and the negatives it brings. Here’s how it goes:
